Damaged Caused by any Modifications or Servicing Performed by Person(s) Other Than Nikon Authorised Service Facility. Accessories Including Batteries, Loss of Data, etc are not Covered Under Warranty. Warranty on Free Gifts is as per the Terms of Their Respective Manufactures, Use, Charger, Express or Implied, Etc. are not Covered Under Warranty.
